mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.b_title, B.b_no, B.b_view, M.m_id FROM board B JOIN member M ON B.m_no = M.m_no WHERE B.b_type = 'S' ORDER BY B.b_view DESC, B.b_no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT B.b_title, B.b_date, B.b_view, B.b_groupno, M.m_id FROM board B JOIN member M ON B.m_no = M.m_no WHERE B.b_type = 'S' AND B.b_step = 1 ORDER BY B.b_no DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE b_step = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE b_step > 1
